title: Consumer Offers & Business Development Manager - South Asia
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it! Apple’s Sales organization generates the revenue needed to fuel our ongoing development of products and services. This, in turn, enriches the lives of hundreds of millions of people around the world. Our sales team is, in many ways, the face of Apple to our largest customers. Are you ready for your next challenge? Do your life's best work with the world watching! We are looking for an outstanding individual to develop and drive execution of new offers initiatives, commercial framework, and disruptive affordability programs to increase customer access to Apple products in South Asia region.
description: Undertake a detailed analysis to expand affordability access, deliver innovative and great customer offers for Apple products in all route to markets. Perform both internal/external commercial analysis, emerging market trends, and pricing data to develop a deep knowledge of product offerings. Develop compelling consumer propositions, such as financing, trade-in, device bundle, in-house financing, leasing, subscription, and other affordability offers. End-to-end development and project management of new business initiatives, offers & affordability programs, and demand generation activities by incorporating partners economics, consumer offer construct, and key commercial terms. Lead Apple commercial contract pipeline, including commercial negotiation with key partners’ executive level, and manage partners compliance of key commercial terms. Formulate commercial position and develop a commercial framework in conjunction with country and regional strategic plan. Synthesize, simplify complex problems, design structured recommendations, create and present effective storyline to C-Level executives within partners and Apple.
preferred_qualifications: Deep knowledge of consumer financing schemes, technology products landscape, local channel structures, carrier economics, and offer structures. Thrive in fast-paced and dynamic environments, highly adaptable to stakeholders' business priorities. Problem solver by nature — exceptional skills in synthesizing and simplifying complex problems, and creating programmatic approach recommendations. Ability to design and implement innovative, commercially focused regional/country plans. Highly skilled in managing multiple projects simultaneously and prioritizing tasks effectively. Outstanding verbal and written communication skills with a proven track record of securing buy-in from senior executives externally and internally. Proven experience in negotiating large and complex commercial agreements. Ability to craft compelling linear narratives, articulate strategic thinking concisely, and deliver impactful and inspiring storytelling.
education_experience: Bachelor’s degree required, MS/MBA preferred but not conditional. 10 years experience in commercial roles within carriers, financial institutions, management consulting, or technology vendors.
